ComicInfo.Title: Bloody When Wet
ComicInfo.Summary:
On the road again... everyone's favorite streetwalking dead hits the highway once more, but this time she's got friends. Who's along for the ride, and what's the destination? Hopefully it’s not your town!!
Features a risqué variant, artist and artist risqué variant (Abraham Lopez), plus election variants.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Marco Maccagni | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marco Maccagni | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Abraham Lopez | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Abraham Lopez | 4 | E | Election Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | F | Risqué Election Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 20:30:22. [CVDB556322]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Abraham Lopez, Dan Mendoza, Monika Maccagni
